column2: This is the first recording for training my personal voice model.
Here is a second sentence spoken clearly and at a natural pace.
I am reading this line with a calm and steady tone.
This sentence helps to diversify the training data for better results.
It is useful to record phrases of different lengths for voice training.
In this way the model learns natural intonation and speaking rhythm.
I am pronouncing each word carefully to improve the overall quality.
Preparing a custom voice model requires several minutes of clean audio.
This slightly longer sentence helps the model learn the melody of speech.
Finally I am recording one more line with a neutral and balanced voice.
